languages.text: "Я устал{mf||а} от твоих игр и происков в моих владениях. Приготовься умереть, архонт Иремерисс".
"I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "Я устал{mf||а} от твоих игр и происков в моих владениях. Приготовься умереть, архонт Иремерисс".

traits.locale_text: "I have grown tired of your games and machinations in my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
"I have grown tired of your games and machinations in my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
"I have grown tired of these games and machinations you've ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
"I have grown tired of these games and machinations you've ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
"I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."
"I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

languages.text: « Je commence à me lasser des petits jeux et des machinations que vous avez orchestrés dans mon royaume. Préparez-vous à mourir, archonte Yremeryss ! »
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: « Je commence à me lasser des petits jeux et des machinations que vous avez orchestrés dans mon royaume. Préparez-vous à mourir, archonte Yremeryss ! »

languages.text: “你那些游戏和阴谋诡计已经让我觉得无聊了。准备受死吧，伊芮梅莉斯执政官。”
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: “你那些游戏和阴谋诡计已经让我觉得无聊了。准备受死吧，伊芮梅莉斯执政官。”

languages.text: "Ich bin diese Spiele und Pläne leid, die Ihr in mein Reich gebracht habt. Macht Euch bereit zu sterben, Archontin Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin diese Spiele und Pläne leid, die Ihr in mein Reich gebracht habt. Macht Euch bereit zu sterben, Archontin Yremeryss."

languages.text: «Me he cansado de los juegos y artimañas que has tramado en mi reino. Prepárate para morir, Arconte Yremeryss».
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: «Me he cansado de los juegos y artimañas que has tramado en mi reino. Prepárate para morir, Arconte Yremeryss».

languages.text: 「貴様が我が領地に持ち込んだゲームや陰謀やらには、もうウンザリだ。死ぬ覚悟をしろ、アーコン・イレメリス」
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様が我が領地に持ち込んだゲームや陰謀やらには、もうウンザリだ。死ぬ覚悟をしろ、アーコン・イレメリス」

languages.text: "Diyarıma musallat ettiğin bu oyun ve entrikalardan artık sıkıldım. Ölmeye hazır ol Arkon Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "I have grown tired of the games and machinations you have ushered into my realm. Prepare to die, Archon Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Diyarıma kadar getirdiğin bu oyunlardan ve entrikalardan artık sıkıldım. Ölmeye hazırlan Arkon Yremeryss."
